javax.swing.plaf
Class SplitPaneUI

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      javax.swing.plaf.SplitPaneUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicSplitPaneUI, MultiSplitPaneUI
public abstract class SplitPaneUI
extends ComponentUI

Pluggable look and feel interface for JSplitPane.
